tosdr.case: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication

title: Tracking pixels are used in service-to-user communication
quoteText:
Web Beacons

Pages of our website and our e-mails may contain small electronic files known as web beacons (also known as clear gifs, pixel tags, single-pixel gifs and web bugs) that are tiny graphics with a unique identifier, similar in function to cookies, and are used to track the online movements of web users or to access cookies.
